LanguageData.Gun_M37A2_USCM.label: M37A2 泵动霰弹枪
LanguageData.Gun_M37A2_USCM.description: The M37A2 Pump Shotgun, also known as the M37A2 Combat Shotgun, is a pump-action combat shotgun manufactured by Armat Battlefield Systems. The M37A2 is a simple and effective pump-action shotgun; its "classic" pump-action allows extremely powerful shells to be fired reliably. The M37A2 is employed by the United States Colonial Marine Corps and Weyland-Yutani PMCs。
LanguageData.Gun_M37A2_USCM.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_M37A2_USCM.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_M37A2_USCM.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.label: Striker shotgun
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.description: A cheap-looking semi-automatic shotgun. Has a higher fire rate and high damage output, but low range。
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Gun_ChainShotgun.tools.2.label: muzzle
LanguageData.Gun_TacticalShotgun.label: M45 战术霰弹枪
LanguageData.Gun_TacticalShotgun.description: The M45 Tactical Shotgun is a shotgun used by the United Nations Space Command Army。
LanguageData.Gun_TacticalShotgun.tools.0.label: stock

LanguageData.RF_Gun_AAtwelve.label: 艾奇逊 AA-12 突击霰弹枪
LanguageData.RF_Gun_AAtwelve.description: An automatic shotgun with almost no recoil. Burstfires, moderately accurate just under rifle range, and has high damage output。

LanguageData.Gun_TacticalAutoshotgun.label: M90 自动战术霰弹枪
LanguageData.Gun_TacticalAutoshotgun.description: The M90 Close Assault Weapon System (M90 CAWS) is the UNSC's primary shotgun and is one of the most effective close range infantry weapons used by front line forces。
